timeline.message:
Remove the broken rest interface

Fixes #3873
Remove Maven dependencies of Jersey REST packages as far as possible
Replace frameworks, remove exception out of context
Replace frameworks, remove exception out of context
Replace frameworks, remove exception out of context
Replace frameworks, remove exception out of context

timeline.author: Kathrin-Huber
Kathrin-Huber

replies.bodyText: The only use of the project.template field was to list in the web service which production templates were assigned to the project. Since the web service is removed, it is no longer needed.
replies.author: matthias-ronge

timeline.author: Kathrin-Huber

replies.bodyText: Since the project.template field is removed, the test had to be adapted.
replies.author: matthias-ronge
